turkish_example_sentence: Ben kütüphanede gerekli bilimsel makaleyi bulmadığımda, hayal kırıklığına uğradım.
english_example_sentence: When I did not find the necessary scientific article in the library, I was disappointed.
russian_example_sentence: Когда я не нашел необходимую научную статью в библиотеке, я был разочарован.
